name: Name
orLoginBelow: Or login to access all features
quickStartDescription: Start using the app immediately. We'll create your account automatically.
pleaseWait: Please wait while we set up your account
almostDone: Almost done! Setting up your appointment search
noCitiesAvailable: No cities available for this country
invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
endDateMinimum: Target end date must be at least 210 days from today

cityRequired: Please select at least one city
loadingConfig: Configuration is still loading. Please wait.
basicUserSearchDesc: Your appointment search will start 4 months from today.
premiumCanSearchTomorrow: can search for appointments starting from tomorrow with no end date restrictions.
targetEndDateExplanation: This is the latest date you would accept for an appointment. The search will look for appointments between 4 months from now and this date.
aisCredentialsInfo: Enter your appointment system login credentials. We will automatically retrieve your schedule ID and number of applicants from the system.
step1Desc: Our system monitors 24/7 the availability of appointments at the consulates and date ranges you select.
step2Desc: We send you continuous notifications so you know how your search is progressing.
step3Desc: When we find a date that matches your criteria, we automatically make the reservation so no one else can take it and notify you immediately.
step4Desc: You receive immediate notification when your appointment has been reserved.
moneyBackGuarantee: We cannot guarantee finding a date as it depends on embassy availability, but if you don't get results within one month, we'll refund your money.
securityBenefitText: Your data is encrypted and protected.
globalCoverageText: Support for embassies and consulates in Latin America.
availabilityDisclaimer: We cannot guarantee finding a date as it depends on embassy availability, but we commit to finding an appointment within a maximum of one month.
securityText: Your data is encrypted and protected. Latin America coverage available.
feature1Desc: We check visa appointment availability 24/7 so you don't have to
feature2Desc: Get notified immediately when an appointment becomes available
feature3Desc: Your data is encrypted and protected at all times
feature4Desc: Manage appointments for your entire family in one place
feature5Desc: Support for embassies and consulates in Latin America
adjustFilters: Try adjusting your filters or register a new applicant to get started.
clickToAddFirst: Click 'Register Applicant' to add your first applicant.
concurrentLimitMessage:
You have reached your concurrent applicants limit ({limit}).
To start a new applicant, please end one of your currently running applicants first.

searchPerformedAllCities: The search will be performed in all available cities for this country.

autoFillNote: Schedule ID and Number of Applicants fields will be auto-filled after authentication.

updateApplicantInfo: Update the information for this applicant
fillDetailsToRegister: Fill in the details to register a new applicant

clickToVerifyCredentials: Click to verify your Visa Appointment System credentials and automatically retrieve your Schedule ID
